Message.Title: Shorting Google will be a pleasure!
Message.Msg: I think Google is going to decline. Too much arrogance and cruelty toward customers and publishing partners. I am off of all Google cervices. And Google Nexus is a nonsense. I am giving up even Google "free phone". Quality is terrible and you never know what to expect next. The search engine became P of S. If you didn't find anything on Google it means Nothing. Go to Bing, Ask or Yandex and you will find all what Google ignored without promotions. I am doing no mistake shorting it!

Google recently announced that it will begin offering corporate control features for its Google+ social network to businesses for free - at least for a while. If you run a Google Apps domain, you can set up domain-wide restrictions on how your users interact with Google+. Your users can also make "restricted" posts to Google+ which are visible only to members of your domain. It's social networking, but with corporate oversight.

For every nickel over $7, his 6.4 million shares increase in value by $300,000. Even to Cuban, thatâ€™s real money.

Message.Title: Dem leaders rely on other dems to be as stupid as themselves
Message.Msg: And their wishes have been easily fulfilled. Watching David Axeldingleberry on Fox Sunday with Chris Wallace again dem spinning like the merrygoround in fairy land. Again Axeldingleberry laying the blame on Bush and the last decade without ever once acknowledging the 100 years of failed primary dem party control that has handed us EVERY failed system and entitlement of today. Not just one or two but EVERY stinking yet dems such as Obamadungdufus and Axeldingleberry can rely on the FACT that most dems are as STUPID as themselves. As dem Mr. Alan 'Andrea Mitchell' Greenspan said in 2009 'we are ending a 100 year business cycle which was easily obvious to most of us 'in the know' as was the FACT they chose to begin ending the 100 year cycle 9/2008 just before the election and for one simple reason to crown Obamadungdufus. So gear up for the FILTHY RICH GEORGIE GIRL SOROS FUNDED Charlotte show beginning this week then the October surprise they will all have in store to provide more fake economic turn around instilling the ploy that Obamadungdufus is why. HA! Look at the $5.6 TRILLION debt increase in less than 4 years under Obamadungdufus and the FACT that it will most likely go over $16 TRILLION by the time the Charlotte Show ends. You have to be quite dumb to not see all these FACTS (i.e. 100 years of primary dem party control) and your dumbo leaders such as Obamadungdufus, Queen Pelosi, Dingy Harry the Body Reid and the DO NOTHING SENATE, Axeldingleberry...rely upon that FACT, that you indeed are just as STUPID as them!!! Now lets get off to Charlotte and watch all the hate inspired division of the dunce dem party of today! As the Roberts ruling continues to be analyzed I believe his words say it all: 1. It is a tax just as we all surmised from the beginning and 2; most importantly the court cannot protect the citizens from the consequences of an election. So you see, just as I and many said, Obama has indeed changed the country forever in a very bad way. We indeed will now have the UK failed system of socialized medicine, to replace our very outstanding previously profit driven capitalistic form of medicine that being the very factor that made it so great. What this is truly about is 100 years of primary democrat party failed control for which their chickens indeed have come home to roost and they spent all our money (SS/Medicare, income taxes etc..) on welfare to lock in democrat votes moving forward. 1913 dem Wilson Federal Reserve Bank CREATURE that has debt leveraged our currency to zero intrinsic value, 1933 dem FDR failed SS Ponzi that was only to cost $.03 per pay, 1964 dem LBJ failed Medicare Ponzi now completely broke necessitating socialized medicine with the death panels to preclude costly care for the boomers now retiring in mass and being told all the money taken from them was squandered on welfare, and now Obama under dem Pelosi Congress more debt increase than all prior Presidents combined in less than 3.6 years. Yes Justice Roberts is correct that the court cannot be responsible for the consequences of an election, indeed Obama Care is a huge cost and most importantly this decision will cost many more jobs and the USA as once known is now finished. Hopefully Romney can stand on the 10th Amendment which is correct asserting that healthcare in MA was a states issue and this Federal mandate is not but repealing it now will be tough and impossible without Repubs taking House, Senate and POTUS. Without Harry Reid gone nothing will ever be accomplished.
